item.title: Getting started with wix
item.description: Installation or Setup # Download and install the WiX Toolset from wixtoolset.org. The installer for the WiX Toolset provides also the integration with Visual Studio, after the installation you should be able to create WiX specific projects. Warnings # Admin rights are needed. Some versions of WiX are compatible only with particular version of Visual Studio: V3.11 and afterwards doesn’t include the extensions for Visual Studio, you have to download the extensions for your versions of Visual Studio V3.
